response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe is an absolute match for your needs and aspirations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to me, reflecting its unique qualities and the meticulous craftsmanship involved. I am extending to you a special offer to acquire this product at a price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a high-quality asset but also to benefit from a favorable transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
